job.name: Export_Data_To_Tableau_Server

variable.name: SERVER_ENDPOINT
variable.description: The endpoint of the Tableau server

variable.name: SITE_ID
variable.description: It points to a specific site on Tableau Server or Tableau Online where you want to publish the .hyper file

variable.name: PROJECT_NAME
variable.description: Select a project name where you want to publish the new data source

variable.name: INPUT_FILE_NAME
variable.description: Relative path of a Hyperfile file in the Global Data Space. This file contains data that will be exported to Tableau.

job.description: Publish data to a Tableau Server. Add the following credentials in the scheduling portal TABLEAU_SERVER_USERNAME TABLEAU_SERVER_PASSWORD

task.name: Export_Data_To_Tableau_Server
task.description: Publish data to a Tableau Server Add the following credentials in the scheduling portal TABLEAU_SERVER_USERNAME TABLEAU_SERVER_PASSWORD

variable.name: DOCKER_ENABLED
variable.description: If true, the workflow tasks will be executed inside a docker container

variable.name: DOCKER_IMAGE
variable.description: Name of the docker image used to execute the task

variable.name: TASK_ENABLED
variable.description: Enable or skip the execution of this task

variable.name: SERVER_ENDPOINT
variable.description: The endpoint of the Tableau server

variable.name: SITE_ID
variable.description: It points to a specific site on Tableau Server or Tableau Online where you want to publish the .hyper file

variable.name: PROJECT_NAME
variable.description: Select a project name where you want to publish the new data source

variable.name: INPUT_FILE_NAME
variable.description: The relative path of a Hyperfile file in the Global Data Space that contains data to be exported to Tableau
